product_name: Garmin HRM 3 Premium Heart Rate Monitor Chest Strap
long_description: With a soft, breathable fabric strap, the Garmin HRM 3 Premium heart rate monitor chest strap delivers reliable heart rate data in chafe-free comfort to your Garmin while you chase your fitness goals. Compatible with the Edge 305, 500, 510, 705, 800 and 810; Edge Touring Plus; Forerunner 110, 210, 220, 305, 310XT, 405, 405CX, 410, 610, 620 and 910XT; Dakota 20. Also works with eTrex 30, FR60/FR70; Oregon/Colorado/Monterra; GPSMAP 62s, 62sc, 62st, 62stc, 64s, 64st, 78s and 78sc; Rino 650/650t; fenix; Montana 600, 650 and 650t; Tactix. ANT+ wireless technology sends a signal to your Garmin wrist-top or handheld GPS (sold separately) without picking up interference from nearby athletes' heart rate monitors. Strap material insulates the sensor from static electricity to help reduce false heart-rate spikes; improved sensor algorithms also work to reduce false spikes.
short_description: With a soft, breathable fabric strap, the Garmin HRM 3 Premium heart rate monitor chest strap delivers reliable heart rate data in chafe-free comfort to your Garmin while you chase your fitness goals.
